52 template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Op, typename Policy>
53 class Summa
54  : public DistEvalImpl<typename Op::result_type, Policy>,
55  public std::enable_shared_from_this<Summa<Left, Right, Op, Policy> > {
56  public:
57  typedef Summa<Left, Right, Op, Policy> Summa_;
58  typedef DistEvalImpl<typename Op::result_type, Policy>
59  DistEvalImpl_;
60  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::TensorImpl_
61  TensorImpl_;
62  typedef Left left_type;
63  typedef Right right_type;
64  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::size_type size_type;
65  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::range_type range_type;
66  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::shape_type shape_type;
67  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::pmap_interface
68  pmap_interface;
69  typedef
70  typename DistEvalImpl_::trange_type trange_type;
71  typedef typename DistEvalImpl_::value_type value_type;
72  typedef
73  typename DistEvalImpl_::eval_type eval_type;
74  typedef Op op_type;
75 
76  private:
77  static size_type max_memory_;
78  static size_type
79  max_depth_;
80 
81  // Arguments and operation
82  left_type left_;
83  right_type right_;
84  op_type op_;
85 
86  // Broadcast groups for dense arguments (empty for non-dense arguments)
87  madness::Group row_group_;
88  madness::Group col_group_;
89 
90  // Dimension information
91  const size_type k_;
92  const ProcGrid proc_grid_;
93 
94  // Contraction results
95  ReducePairTask<op_type>* reduce_tasks_;
96 
97  // Constants used to iterate over columns and rows of left_ and right_,
98  // respectively.
99  const size_type
100  left_start_local_;
101  const size_type left_end_;
103  const size_type left_stride_;
104  const size_type
105  left_stride_local_;
106  const size_type right_stride_;
107  const size_type
108  right_stride_local_;
109 
110  typedef Future<typename right_type::eval_type>
111  right_future;
112  typedef Future<typename left_type::eval_type>
113  left_future;
114  typedef std::pair<size_type, right_future>
115  row_datum;
116  typedef std::pair<size_type, left_future>
117  col_datum;

132  // Static variable initialization ----------------------------------------
133 
135  static size_type init_max_memory() {
136  const char* max_memory = getenv("TA_SUMMA_MAX_MEMORY");
137  if (max_memory) {
138  // Convert the string into bytes
139  std::stringstream ss(max_memory);
140  double memory = 0.0;
141  if (ss >> memory) {
142  if (memory > 0.0) {
143  std::string unit;
144  if (ss >> unit) { // Failure == assume bytes
145  if (unit == "KB" || unit == "kB") {
146  memory *= 1000.0;
147  } else if (unit == "KiB" || unit == "kiB") {
148  memory *= 1024.0;
149  } else if (unit == "MB") {
150  memory *= 1000000.0;
151  } else if (unit == "MiB") {
152  memory *= 1048576.0;
153  } else if (unit == "GB") {
154  memory *= 1000000000.0;
155  } else if (unit == "GiB") {
156  memory *= 1073741824.0;
157  }
158  }
159  }
160  }
161 
162  memory = std::max(memory, 104857600.0); // Minimum 100 MiB
163  return memory;
164  }
165 
166  return 0ul;
167  }
168 
169  static size_type init_max_depth() {
170  const char* max_depth = getenv("TA_SUMMA_MAX_DEPTH");
171  if (max_depth) return std::stoul(max_depth);
172  return 0ul;
173  }

200  template <typename Shape, typename ProcMap>
201  madness::Group make_group(const Shape& shape,
202  const std::vector<bool>& process_mask,
203  size_type index, const size_type end,
204  const size_type stride,
205  const size_type max_group_size, const size_type k,
206  const size_type key_offset,
207  const ProcMap& proc_map) const {
208  // Generate the list of processes in rank_row
209  std::vector<ProcessID> proc_list(max_group_size, -1);
210 
211  // Flag the root processes of the broadcast, which may not be included
212  // by shape.
213  size_type p = k % max_group_size;
214  proc_list[p] = proc_map(p);
215  size_type count = 1ul;
216 
217  // Flag all processes that have non-zero tiles
218  for (p = 0ul; (index < end) && (count < max_group_size);
219  index += stride, p = (p + 1u) % max_group_size) {
220  if ((proc_list[p] != -1) || (shape.is_zero(index)) || !process_mask.at(p))
221  continue;
222 
223  proc_list[p] = proc_map(p);
224  ++count;
225  }
226 
227  // Remove processes from the list that will not be in the group
228  for (size_type x = 0ul, p = 0ul; x < count; ++p) {
229  if (proc_list[p] == -1) continue;
230  proc_list[x++] = proc_list[p];
231  }
232 
233  // Truncate invalid process id's
234  proc_list.resize(count);
235 
236  return madness::Group(
237  TensorImpl_::world(), proc_list,
238  madness::DistributedID(DistEvalImpl_::id(), k + key_offset));
239  }
240 
242 
245  madness::Group make_row_group(const size_type k) const {
246  // Construct the sparse broadcast group
247  const size_type right_begin_k = k * proc_grid_.cols();
248  const size_type right_end_k = right_begin_k + proc_grid_.cols();
249  // make the row mask; using the same mask for all tiles avoids having to
250  // compute mask for every tile and use of masked broadcasts
251  auto result_row_mask_k = make_row_mask(k);
252 
253  // return empty group if I am not in this group, otherwise make a group
254  if (result_row_mask_k[proc_grid_.rank_col()])
255  return make_group(right_.shape(), result_row_mask_k, right_begin_k,
256  right_end_k, right_stride_, proc_grid_.proc_cols(), k,
257  k_, [&](const ProcGrid::size_type col) {
258  return proc_grid_.map_col(col);
259  });
260  else
261  return madness::Group();
262  }
263 
265 
268  madness::Group make_col_group(const size_type k) const {
269  // make the column mask; using the same mask for all tiles avoids having to
270  // compute mask for every tile and use of masked broadcasts
271  auto result_col_mask_k = make_col_mask(k);
272 
273  // return empty group if I am not in this group, otherwise make a group
274  if (result_col_mask_k[proc_grid_.rank_row()])
275  return make_group(left_.shape(), result_col_mask_k, k, left_end_,
276  left_stride_, proc_grid_.proc_rows(), k, 0ul,
277  [&](const ProcGrid::size_type row) {
278  return proc_grid_.map_row(row);
279  });
280  else
281  return madness::Group();
282  }
283 
285 
290  std::vector<bool> make_row_mask(const size_type k) const {
291  // "local" A[i][k] (i.e. for all i assigned to my row of processes) will
292  // produce C[i][*] for each process in my row of the process grid determine
293  // whether there are any nonzero C[i][*] located on that node
294 
295  const auto nproc_cols = proc_grid_.proc_cols();
296  const auto my_proc_row = proc_grid_.rank_row();
297 
298  // result shape
299  const auto& result_shape = TensorImpl_::shape();
300 
301  // if result is dense, include all processors
302  if (result_shape.is_dense()) return std::vector<bool>(nproc_cols, true);
303 
304  // initialize the mask
305  std::vector<bool> mask(nproc_cols, false);
306 
307  // number of tiles in the col dimension of the result
308  const auto nj = proc_grid_.cols();
309  // number of tiles in contraction dim
310  const auto nk = k_;
311 
312  // for each i assigned to my row of processes ...
313  size_type i_start, i_fence, i_stride;
314  std::tie(i_start, i_fence, i_stride) = result_row_range(my_proc_row);
315  const auto ik_stride = i_stride * nk;
316  for (size_type i = i_start, ik = i_start * nk + k; i < i_fence;
317  i += i_stride, ik += ik_stride) {
318  // ... such that A[i][k] exists ...
319  if (!left_.shape().is_zero(ik)) {
320  // ... the owner of А[i][k] is always in the group ...
321  const auto k_proc_col = k % nproc_cols;
322  mask[k_proc_col] = true;
323  // ... loop over processes in my row ...
324  for (size_type proc_col = 0; proc_col != nproc_cols; ++proc_col) {
325  // ... that are not the owner of A[i][k] ...
326  if (proc_col != k_proc_col) {
327  // ... loop over all C[i][j] tiles that belong to this process ...
328  size_type j_start, j_fence, j_stride;
329  std::tie(j_start, j_fence, j_stride) = result_col_range(proc_col);
330  const auto ij_stride = j_stride;
331  for (size_type j = j_start, ij = i * nj + j_start; j < j_fence;
332  j += j_stride, ij += ij_stride) {
333  // ... if any such C[i][j] exists, update the mask, and move
334  // on to next process
335  if (!result_shape.is_zero(
336  DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_target(ij))) {
337  mask[proc_col] = true;
338  break;
339  }
340  }
341  }
342  }
343  }
344  }
345 
346  return mask;
347  }
348 
350 
355  std::vector<bool> make_col_mask(const size_type k) const {
356  // "local" B[k][j] (i.e. for all j assigned to my column of processes)
357  // will produce C[*][j]
358  // for each process in my column of the process grid determine whether
359  // there are any
360  // nonzero C[*][j] located on that node
361 
362  const auto nproc_rows = proc_grid_.proc_rows();
363  const auto my_proc_col = proc_grid_.rank_col();
364 
365  // result shape
366  const auto& result_shape = TensorImpl_::shape();
367 
368  // if result is dense, include all processors
369  if (result_shape.is_dense()) return std::vector<bool>(nproc_rows, true);
370 
371  // initialize the mask
372  std::vector<bool> mask(nproc_rows, false);
373 
374  // number of tiles in col dim of the result
375  const auto nj = proc_grid_.cols();
376 
377  // for each j assigned to my column of processes ...
378  size_type j_start, j_fence, j_stride;
379  std::tie(j_start, j_fence, j_stride) = result_col_range(my_proc_col);
380  const auto kj_stride = j_stride;
381  for (size_type j = j_start, kj = k * nj + j_start; j < j_fence;
382  j += j_stride, kj += kj_stride) {
383  // ... such that B[k][j] exists ...
384  if (!right_.shape().is_zero(kj)) {
385  // ... the owner of B[k][j] is always in the group ...
386  auto k_proc_row = k % nproc_rows;
387  mask[k_proc_row] = true;
388  // ... loop over processes in my col ...
389  for (size_type proc_row = 0; proc_row != nproc_rows; ++proc_row) {
390  // ... that are not the owner of B[k][j] ...
391  if (proc_row != k_proc_row) {
392  // ... loop over all C[i][j] tiles that belong to this process
393  size_type i_start, i_fence, i_stride;
394  std::tie(i_start, i_fence, i_stride) = result_row_range(proc_row);
395  const auto ij_stride = i_stride * nj;
396  for (size_type i = i_start, ij = i_start * nj + j; i < i_fence;
397  i += i_stride, ij += ij_stride) {
398  // ... if any such C[i][j] exists, update the mask, and move
399  // on to next process
400  if (!result_shape.is_zero(
401  DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_target(ij))) {
402  mask[proc_row] = true;
403  break;
404  }
405  }
406  }
407  }
408  }
409  }
410 
411  return mask;
412  }
413 
415 
420  inline std::tuple<size_type, size_type, size_type> result_row_range(
421  size_type proc_row) const {
422  const size_type start = proc_row;
423  const size_type fence = proc_grid_.rows();
424  const size_type stride = proc_grid_.proc_rows();
425  return std::make_tuple(start, fence, stride);
426  }
427 
429 
434  std::tuple<size_type, size_type, size_type> result_col_range(
435  size_type proc_col) const {
436  const size_type start = proc_col;
437  const size_type fence = proc_grid_.cols();
438  const size_type stride = proc_grid_.proc_cols();
439  return std::make_tuple(start, fence, stride);
440  }

449  template <typename Tile>
450  static auto convert_tile(const Tile& tile) {
451  TiledArray::Cast<typename eval_trait<Tile>::type, Tile> cast;
452  return cast(tile);
453  }

456 
462  template <typename Arg>
463  static typename std::enable_if<!is_lazy_tile<typename Arg::value_type>::value,
464  Future<typename Arg::eval_type> >::type
465  get_tile(Arg& arg, const typename Arg::size_type index) {
466  return arg.get(index);
467  }
468 
470 
477  template <typename Arg>
478  static typename std::enable_if<
479  is_lazy_tile<typename Arg::value_type>::value
480 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
481  && !detail::is_cuda_tile<typename Arg::value_type>::value
482 #endif
483  ,
484  Future<typename Arg::eval_type> >::type
485  get_tile(Arg& arg, const typename Arg::size_type index) {
486  auto convert_tile_fn =
487  &Summa_::template convert_tile<typename Arg::value_type>;
488  return arg.world().taskq.add(convert_tile_fn, arg.get(index),
489  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
490  }
491 
492 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
493 
501  template <typename Arg>
502  static typename std::enable_if<
503  is_lazy_tile<typename Arg::value_type>::value &&
504  detail::is_cuda_tile<typename Arg::value_type>::value,
505  Future<typename Arg::eval_type> >::type
506  get_tile(Arg& arg, const typename Arg::size_type index) {
507  auto convert_tile_fn =
508  &Summa_::template convert_tile<typename Arg::value_type>;
509  return madness::add_cuda_task(arg.world(), convert_tile_fn, arg.get(index),
510  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
511  }
512 #endif

515 
523  template <typename Arg, typename Datum>
524  void get_vector(Arg& arg, size_type index, const size_type end,
525  const size_type stride, std::vector<Datum>& vec) const {
526  TA_ASSERT(vec.size() == 0ul);
527 
528  // Iterate over vector of tiles
529  if (arg.is_local(index)) {
530  for (size_type i = 0ul; index < end; ++i, index += stride) {
531  if (arg.shape().is_zero(index)) continue;
532  vec.emplace_back(i, get_tile(arg, index));
533  }
534  } else {
535  for (size_type i = 0ul; index < end; ++i, index += stride) {
536  if (arg.shape().is_zero(index)) continue;
537  vec.emplace_back(i, Future<typename Arg::eval_type>());
538  }
539  }
540 
541  TA_ASSERT(vec.size() > 0ul);
542  }
543 
545 
548  void get_col(const size_type k, std::vector<col_datum>& col) const {
549  col.reserve(proc_grid_.local_rows());
550  get_vector(left_, left_start_local_ + k, left_end_, left_stride_local_,
551  col);
552  }
553 
555 
558  void get_row(const size_type k, std::vector<row_datum>& row) const {
559  row.reserve(proc_grid_.local_cols());
560 
561  // Compute local iteration limits for row k of right_.
562  size_type begin = k * proc_grid_.cols();
563  const size_type end = begin + proc_grid_.cols();
564  begin += proc_grid_.rank_col();
565 
566  get_vector(right_, begin, end, right_stride_local_, row);
567  }
568 
570 
577  template <typename Datum>
578  void bcast(const size_type start, const size_type stride,
579  const madness::Group& group, const ProcessID group_root,
580  const size_type key_offset, std::vector<Datum>& vec) const {
581  TA_ASSERT(vec.size() != 0ul);
582  TA_ASSERT(group.size() > 0);
583  TA_ASSERT(group_root < group.size());
584 
585 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_BCAST
586  std::stringstream ss;
587  ss << "bcast: rank=" << TensorImpl_::world().rank()
588  << " root=" << group.world_rank(group_root) << " groupid=("
589  << group.id().first << "," << group.id().second
590  << ") keyoffset=" << key_offset << " group={ ";
591  for (ProcessID group_proc = 0; group_proc < group.size(); ++group_proc)
592  ss << group.world_rank(group_proc) << " ";
593  ss << "} tiles={ ";
594 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_BCAST
595 
596  // Iterate over tiles to be broadcast
597  for (typename std::vector<Datum>::iterator it = vec.begin();
598  it != vec.end(); ++it) {
599  const size_type index = it->first * stride + start;
600 
601  // Broadcast the tile
602  const madness::DistributedID key(DistEvalImpl_::id(), index + key_offset);
603  TensorImpl_::world().gop.bcast(key, it->second, group_root, group);
604 
605 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_BCAST
606  ss << index << " ";
607 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_BCAST
608  }
609 
610  TA_ASSERT(vec.size() > 0ul);
611 
612 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_BCAST
613  ss << "}\n";
614  printf(ss.str().c_str());
615 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_BCAST
616  }
617 
618  // Broadcast specialization for left and right arguments -----------------
619 
620  ProcessID get_row_group_root(const size_type k,
621  const madness::Group& row_group) const {
622  ProcessID group_root = k % proc_grid_.proc_cols();
623  if (!right_.shape().is_dense() &&
624  row_group.size() < static_cast<ProcessID>(proc_grid_.proc_cols())) {
625  const ProcessID world_root =
626  proc_grid_.rank_row() * proc_grid_.proc_cols() + group_root;
627  group_root = row_group.rank(world_root);
628  }
629  return group_root;
630  }
631 
632  ProcessID get_col_group_root(const size_type k,
633  const madness::Group& col_group) const {
634  ProcessID group_root = k % proc_grid_.proc_rows();
635  if (!left_.shape().is_dense() &&
636  col_group.size() < static_cast<ProcessID>(proc_grid_.proc_rows())) {
637  const ProcessID world_root =
638  group_root * proc_grid_.proc_cols() + proc_grid_.rank_col();
639  group_root = col_group.rank(world_root);
640  }
641  return group_root;
642  }
643 
645 
648  void bcast_col(const size_type k, std::vector<col_datum>& col,
649  const madness::Group& row_group) const {
650  // broadcast if I'm part of the broadcast group
651  if (!row_group.empty()) {
652  // Broadcast column k of left_.
653  ProcessID group_root = get_row_group_root(k, row_group);
654  bcast(left_start_local_ + k, left_stride_local_, row_group, group_root,
655  0ul, col);
656  }
657  }
658 
660 
663  void bcast_row(const size_type k, std::vector<row_datum>& row,
664  const madness::Group& col_group) const {
665  // broadcast if I'm part of the broadcast group
666  if (!col_group.empty()) {
667  // Compute the group root process.
668  ProcessID group_root = get_col_group_root(k, col_group);
669 
670  // Broadcast row k of right_.
671  bcast(k * proc_grid_.cols() + proc_grid_.rank_col(), right_stride_local_,
672  col_group, group_root, left_.size(), row);
673  }
674  }
675 
676  void bcast_col_range_task(size_type k, const size_type end) const {
677  // Compute the first local row of right
678  const size_type Pcols = proc_grid_.proc_cols();
679  k += (Pcols - ((k + Pcols - proc_grid_.rank_col()) % Pcols)) % Pcols;
680 
681  for (; k < end; k += Pcols) {
682  // Compute local iteration limits for column k of left_.
683  size_type index = left_start_local_ + k;
684 
685  // will create broadcast group only if needed
686  bool have_group = false;
687  madness::Group row_group;
688  ProcessID group_root;
689  bool do_broadcast;
690 
691  // Search column k of left for non-zero tiles
692  for (; index < left_end_; index += left_stride_local_) {
693  if (left_.shape().is_zero(index)) continue;
694 
695  // Construct broadcast group, if needed
696  if (!have_group) {
697  have_group = true;
698  row_group = make_row_group(k);
699  // broadcast if I am in this group and this group has others
700  do_broadcast = !row_group.empty() && row_group.size() > 1;
701  if (do_broadcast) group_root = get_row_group_root(k, row_group);
702  }
703 
704  if (do_broadcast) {
705  // Broadcast the tile
706  const madness::DistributedID key(DistEvalImpl_::id(), index);
707  auto tile = get_tile(left_, index);
708  TensorImpl_::world().gop.bcast(key, tile, group_root, row_group);
709  } else {
710  // Discard the tile
711  left_.discard(index);
712  }
713  }
714  }
715  }
716 
717  void bcast_row_range_task(size_type k, const size_type end) const {
718  // Compute the first local row of right
719  const size_type Prows = proc_grid_.proc_rows();
720  k += (Prows - ((k + Prows - proc_grid_.rank_row()) % Prows)) % Prows;
721 
722  for (; k < end; k += Prows) {
723  // Compute local iteration limits for row k of right_.
724  size_type index = k * proc_grid_.cols();
725  const size_type row_end = index + proc_grid_.cols();
726  index += proc_grid_.rank_col();
727 
728  // will create broadcast group only if needed
729  bool have_group = false;
730  madness::Group col_group;
731  ProcessID group_root;
732  bool do_broadcast;
733 
734  // Search for and broadcast non-zero row
735  for (; index < row_end; index += right_stride_local_) {
736  if (right_.shape().is_zero(index)) continue;
737 
738  // Construct broadcast group
739  if (!have_group) {
740  have_group = true;
741  col_group = make_col_group(k);
742  // broadcast if I am in this group and this group has others
743  do_broadcast = !col_group.empty() && col_group.size() > 1;
744  if (do_broadcast) group_root = get_col_group_root(k, col_group);
745  }
746 
747  if (do_broadcast) {
748  // Broadcast the tile
749  const madness::DistributedID key(DistEvalImpl_::id(),
750  index + left_.size());
751  auto tile = get_tile(right_, index);
752  TensorImpl_::world().gop.bcast(key, tile, group_root, col_group);
753  } else {
754  // Discard the tile
755  right_.discard(index);
756  }
757  }
758  }
759  }
760 
761  // Row and column iteration functions ------------------------------------
762 
764 
771  size_type iterate_row(size_type k) const {
772  // Iterate over k's until a non-zero tile is found or the end of the
773  // matrix is reached.
774  size_type end = k * proc_grid_.cols();
775  for (; k < k_; ++k) {
776  // Search for non-zero tiles in row k of right
777  size_type i = end + proc_grid_.rank_col();
778  end += proc_grid_.cols();
779  for (; i < end; i += right_stride_local_)
780  if (!right_.shape().is_zero(i)) return k;
781  }
782 
783  return k;
784  }
785 
787 
794  size_type iterate_col(size_type k) const {
795  // Iterate over k's until a non-zero tile is found or the end of the
796  // matrix is reached.
797  for (; k < k_; ++k)
798  // Search row k for non-zero tiles
799  for (size_type i = left_start_local_ + k; i < left_end_;
800  i += left_stride_local_)
801  if (!left_.shape().is_zero(i)) return k;
802 
803  return k;
804  }
805 
808 
817  size_type iterate_sparse(const size_type k) const {
818  // Initial step for k_col and k_row.
819  size_type k_col = iterate_col(k);
820  size_type k_row = iterate_row(k_col);
821 
822  // Search for a row and column that both have non-zero tiles
823  while (k_col != k_row) {
824  if (k_col < k_row) {
825  k_col = iterate_col(k_row);
826  } else {
827  k_row = iterate_row(k_col);
828  }
829  }
830 
831  if (k < k_row) {
832  // Spawn a task to broadcast any local columns of left that were skipped
833  TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(shared_from_this(),
834  &Summa_::bcast_col_range_task, k, k_row,
835  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
836 
837  // Spawn a task to broadcast any local rows of right that were skipped
838  TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(shared_from_this(),
839  &Summa_::bcast_row_range_task, k, k_col,
840  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
841  }
842 
843  return k_col;
844  }
845 
848 
857  size_type iterate(const size_type k) const {
858  return (left_.shape().is_dense() && right_.shape().is_dense()
859  ? k
860  : iterate_sparse(k));
861  }
862 
863  // Initialization functions ----------------------------------------------
864 
866  size_type initialize(const DenseShape&) {
867  // Construct static broadcast groups for dense arguments
868  const madness::DistributedID col_did(DistEvalImpl_::id(), 0ul);
869  col_group_ = proc_grid_.make_col_group(col_did);
870  const madness::DistributedID row_did(DistEvalImpl_::id(), k_);
871  row_group_ = proc_grid_.make_row_group(row_did);
872 
873 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
874  std::stringstream ss;
875  ss << "init: rank=" << TensorImpl_::world().rank() << "\n col_group_=("
876  << col_did.first << ", " << col_did.second << ") { ";
877  for (ProcessID gproc = 0ul; gproc < col_group_.size(); ++gproc)
878  ss << col_group_.world_rank(gproc) << " ";
879  ss << "}\n row_group_=(" << row_did.first << ", " << row_did.second
880  << ") { ";
881  for (ProcessID gproc = 0ul; gproc < row_group_.size(); ++gproc)
882  ss << row_group_.world_rank(gproc) << " ";
883  ss << "}\n";
884  printf(ss.str().c_str());
885 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
886 
887  // Allocate memory for the reduce pair tasks.
888  std::allocator<ReducePairTask<op_type> > alloc;
889  reduce_tasks_ = alloc.allocate(proc_grid_.local_size());
890 
891  // Iterate over all local tiles
892  const size_type n = proc_grid_.local_size();
893  for (size_type t = 0ul; t < n; ++t) {
894  // Initialize the reduction task
895  ReducePairTask<op_type>* MADNESS_RESTRICT const reduce_task =
896  reduce_tasks_ + t;
897  new (reduce_task) ReducePairTask<op_type>(TensorImpl_::world(), op_);
898  }
899 
900  return proc_grid_.local_size();
901  }
902 
904  template <typename Shape>
905  size_type initialize(const Shape& shape) {
906 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
907  std::stringstream ss;
908  ss << " initialize rank=" << TensorImpl_::world().rank() << " tiles={ ";
909 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
910 
911  // Allocate memory for the reduce pair tasks.
912  std::allocator<ReducePairTask<op_type> > alloc;
913  reduce_tasks_ = alloc.allocate(proc_grid_.local_size());
914 
915  // Initialize iteration variables
916  size_type row_start = proc_grid_.rank_row() * proc_grid_.cols();
917  size_type row_end = row_start + proc_grid_.cols();
918  row_start += proc_grid_.rank_col();
919  const size_type col_stride = // The stride to iterate down a column
920  proc_grid_.proc_rows() * proc_grid_.cols();
921  const size_type row_stride = // The stride to iterate across a row
922  proc_grid_.proc_cols();
923  const size_type end = TensorImpl_::size();
924 
925  // Iterate over all local tiles
926  size_type tile_count = 0ul;
927  ReducePairTask<op_type>* MADNESS_RESTRICT reduce_task = reduce_tasks_;
928  // this loops over result tiles arranged in block-cyclic order
929  // index = tile index (row major)
930  for (; row_start < end; row_start += col_stride, row_end += col_stride) {
931  for (size_type index = row_start; index < row_end;
932  index += row_stride, ++reduce_task) {
933  // Initialize the reduction task
934 
935  // Skip zero tiles
936  if (!shape.is_zero(DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_target(index))) {
937 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
938  ss << index << " ";
939 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
940 
941  new (reduce_task) ReducePairTask<op_type>(TensorImpl_::world(), op_);
942  ++tile_count;
943  } else {
944  // Construct an empty task to represent zero tiles.
945  new (reduce_task) ReducePairTask<op_type>();
946  }
947  }
948  }
949 
950 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
951  ss << "}\n";
952  printf(ss.str().c_str());
953 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
954 
955  return tile_count;
956  }
957 
958  size_type initialize() {
959 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
960  printf("init: start rank=%i\n", TensorImpl_::world().rank());
961 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
962 
963  const size_type result = initialize(TensorImpl_::shape());
964 
965 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
966  printf("init: finish rank=%i\n", TensorImpl_::world().rank());
967 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_INITIALIZE
968 
969  return result;
970  }
971 
972  // Finalize functions ----------------------------------------------------
973 
975  void finalize(const DenseShape&) {
976  // Initialize iteration variables
977  size_type row_start = proc_grid_.rank_row() * proc_grid_.cols();
978  size_type row_end = row_start + proc_grid_.cols();
979  row_start += proc_grid_.rank_col();
980  const size_type col_stride = // The stride to iterate down a column
981  proc_grid_.proc_rows() * proc_grid_.cols();
982  const size_type row_stride = // The stride to iterate across a row
983  proc_grid_.proc_cols();
984  const size_type end = TensorImpl_::size();
985 
986  // Iterate over all local tiles
987  for (ReducePairTask<op_type>* reduce_task = reduce_tasks_; row_start < end;
988  row_start += col_stride, row_end += col_stride) {
989  for (size_type index = row_start; index < row_end;
990  index += row_stride, ++reduce_task) {
991  // Set the result tile
992  DistEvalImpl_::set_tile(DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_target(index),
993  reduce_task->submit());
994 
995  // Destroy the reduce task
996  reduce_task->~ReducePairTask<op_type>();
997  }
998  }
999 
1000  // Deallocate the memory for the reduce pair tasks.
1001  std::allocator<ReducePairTask<op_type> >().deallocate(
1002  reduce_tasks_, proc_grid_.local_size());
1003  }
1004 
1006  template <typename Shape>
1007  void finalize(const Shape& shape) {
1008 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_FINALIZE
1009  std::stringstream ss;
1010  ss << " finalize rank=" << TensorImpl_::world().rank() << " tiles={ ";
1011 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_FINALIZE
1012 
1013  // Initialize iteration variables
1014  size_type row_start = proc_grid_.rank_row() * proc_grid_.cols();
1015  size_type row_end = row_start + proc_grid_.cols();
1016  row_start += proc_grid_.rank_col();
1017  const size_type col_stride = // The stride to iterate down a column
1018  proc_grid_.proc_rows() * proc_grid_.cols();
1019  const size_type row_stride = // The stride to iterate across a row
1020  proc_grid_.proc_cols();
1021  const size_type end = TensorImpl_::size();
1022 
1023  // Iterate over all local tiles
1024  for (ReducePairTask<op_type>* reduce_task = reduce_tasks_; row_start < end;
1025  row_start += col_stride, row_end += col_stride) {
1026  for (size_type index = row_start; index < row_end;
1027  index += row_stride, ++reduce_task) {
1028  // Compute the permuted index
1029  const size_type perm_index = DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_target(index);
1030 
1031  // Skip zero tiles
1032  if (!shape.is_zero(perm_index)) {
1033 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_FINALIZE
1034  ss << index << " ";
1035 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_FINALIZE
1036 
1037  // Set the result tile
1038  DistEvalImpl_::set_tile(perm_index, reduce_task->submit());
1039  }
1040 
1041  // Destroy the reduce task
1042  reduce_task->~ReducePairTask<op_type>();
1043  }
1044  }
1045  // Deallocate the memory for the reduce pair tasks.
1046  std::allocator<ReducePairTask<op_type> >().deallocate(
1047  reduce_tasks_, proc_grid_.local_size());
1048 
1049 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_FINALIZE
1050  ss << "}\n";
1051  printf(ss.str().c_str());
1052 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_FINALIZE
1053  }
1054 
1055  void finalize() {
1056 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_FINALIZE
1057  printf("finalize: start rank=%i\n", TensorImpl_::world().rank());
1058 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_FINALIZE
1059 
1060  finalize(TensorImpl_::shape());
1061 
1062 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_FINALIZE
1063  printf("finalize: finish rank=%i\n", TensorImpl_::world().rank());
1064 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_FINALIZE
1065  }
1066 
1068 
1070  class FinalizeTask : public madness::TaskInterface {
1071  private:
1072  std::shared_ptr<Summa_> owner_;
1073 
1074  public:
1075  FinalizeTask(const std::shared_ptr<Summa_>& owner, const int ndep)
1076  : madness::TaskInterface(ndep, madness::TaskAttributes::hipri()),
1077  owner_(owner) {}
1078 
1079  virtual ~FinalizeTask() {}
1080 
1081  virtual void run(const madness::TaskThreadEnv&) { owner_->finalize(); }
1082 
1083  }; // class FinalizeTask
1084 
1085  // Contraction functions -------------------------------------------------
1086 
1088 
1095  void contract(const DenseShape&, const size_type,
1096  const std::vector<col_datum>& col,
1097  const std::vector<row_datum>& row,
1098  madness::TaskInterface* const task) {
1099  // Iterate over the row
1100  for (size_type i = 0ul; i < col.size(); ++i) {
1101  // Compute the local, result-tile offset
1102  const size_type reduce_task_offset =
1103  col[i].first * proc_grid_.local_cols();
1104 
1105  // Iterate over columns
1106  for (size_type j = 0ul; j < row.size(); ++j) {
1107  const size_type reduce_task_index = reduce_task_offset + row[j].first;
1108 
1109  // Schedule task for contraction pairs
1110  if (task) task->inc();
1111  const left_future left = col[i].second;
1112  const right_future right = row[j].second;
1113  reduce_tasks_[reduce_task_index].add(left, right, task);
1114  }
1115  }
1116  }
1117 
1119 
1126  template <typename Shape>
1127  void contract(const Shape&, const size_type,
1128  const std::vector<col_datum>& col,
1129  const std::vector<row_datum>& row,
1130  madness::TaskInterface* const task) {
1131  // Iterate over the row
1132  for (size_type i = 0ul; i < col.size(); ++i) {
1133  // Compute the local, result-tile offset
1134  const size_type reduce_task_offset =
1135  col[i].first * proc_grid_.local_cols();
1136 
1137  // Iterate over columns
1138  for (size_type j = 0ul; j < row.size(); ++j) {
1139  const size_type reduce_task_index = reduce_task_offset + row[j].first;
1140 
1141  // Skip zero tiles
1142  if (!reduce_tasks_[reduce_task_index]) continue;
1143 
1144  // Schedule task for contraction pairs
1145  if (task) {
1146  if (trace_tasks)
1147  task->inc_debug("destroy(*ReduceObject)");
1148  else
1149  task->inc();
1150  }
1151  const left_future left = col[i].second;
1152  const right_future right = row[j].second;
1153  reduce_tasks_[reduce_task_index].add(left, right, task);
1154  }
1155  }
1156  }
1157 
1158 #define TILEDARRAY_DISABLE_TILE_CONTRACTION_FILTER
1159 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_DISABLE_TILE_CONTRACTION_FILTER
1160 
1172  template <typename T>
1173  typename std::enable_if<std::is_floating_point<T>::value>::type contract(
1174  const SparseShape<T>&, const size_type k,
1175  const std::vector<col_datum>& col, const std::vector<row_datum>& row,
1176  madness::TaskInterface* const task) {
1177  // Cache row shape data.
1178  std::vector<typename SparseShape<T>::value_type> row_shape_values;
1179  row_shape_values.reserve(row.size());
1180  const size_type row_start = k * proc_grid_.cols() + proc_grid_.rank_col();
1181  for (size_type j = 0ul; j < row.size(); ++j)
1182  row_shape_values.push_back(
1183  right_.shape()[row_start + (row[j].first * right_stride_local_)]);
1184 
1185  const size_type col_start = left_start_local_ + k;
1186  const float threshold_k = TensorImpl_::shape().threshold() /
1187  typename SparseShape<T>::value_type(k_);
1188  // Iterate over the row
1189  for (size_type i = 0ul; i != col.size(); ++i) {
1190  // Compute the local, result-tile offset
1191  const size_type offset = col[i].first * proc_grid_.local_cols();
1192 
1193  // Get the shape data for col_it tile
1194  const typename SparseShape<T>::value_type col_shape_value =
1195  left_.shape()[col_start + (col[i].first * left_stride_local_)];
1196 
1197  // Iterate over columns
1198  for (size_type j = 0ul; j < row.size(); ++j) {
1199  if ((col_shape_value * row_shape_values[j]) < threshold_k) continue;
1200 
1201  const size_type reduce_task_index = offset + row[j].first;
1202 
1203  // Skip zero tiles
1204  if (!reduce_tasks_[reduce_task_index]) continue;
1205 
1206  if (task) task->inc();
1207  reduce_tasks_[reduce_task_index].add(col[i].second, row[j].second,
1208  task);
1209  }
1210  }
1211  }
1212 #endif // TILEDARRAY_DISABLE_TILE_CONTRACTION_FILTER
1213 
1214  void contract(const size_type k, const std::vector<col_datum>& col,
1215  const std::vector<row_datum>& row,
1216  madness::TaskInterface* const task) {
1217  contract(TensorImpl_::shape(), k, col, row, task);
1218  }
1219 
1220  // SUMMA step task -------------------------------------------------------
1221 
1223 
1226  class StepTask : public madness::TaskInterface {
1227  protected:
1228  // Member variables
1229  std::shared_ptr<Summa_> owner_;
1230  World& world_;
1231  std::vector<col_datum> col_{};
1232  std::vector<row_datum> row_{};
1233  FinalizeTask* finalize_task_;
1234  StepTask* next_step_task_ = nullptr;
1235  StepTask* tail_step_task_ =
1236  nullptr;
1237 
1238  void get_col(const size_type k) {
1239  owner_->get_col(k, col_);
1240  if (trace_tasks)
1241  this->notify_debug("StepTask::spawn_col");
1242  else
1243  this->notify();
1244  }
1245 
1246  void get_row(const size_type k) {
1247  owner_->get_row(k, row_);
1248  if (trace_tasks)
1249  this->notify_debug("StepTask::spawn_row");
1250  else
1251  this->notify();
1252  }
1253 
1254  public:
1255  StepTask(const std::shared_ptr<Summa_>& owner, int finalize_ndep)
1256  :
1257 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_TASK_DEBUG_TRACE
1258  madness::TaskInterface(0ul, "StepTask 1st ctor",
1259  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri()),
1260 #else
1261  madness::TaskInterface(0ul, madness::TaskAttributes::hipri()),
1262 #endif
1263  owner_(owner),
1264  world_(owner->world()),
1265  finalize_task_(new FinalizeTask(owner, finalize_ndep)) {
1266  TA_ASSERT(owner_);
1267  owner_->world().taskq.add(finalize_task_);
1268  }
1269 
1271 
1274  StepTask(StepTask* const parent, const int ndep)
1275  :
1276 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_TASK_DEBUG_TRACE
1277  madness::TaskInterface(ndep, "StepTask nth ctor",
1278  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri()),
1279 #else
1280  madness::TaskInterface(ndep, madness::TaskAttributes::hipri()),
1281 #endif
1282  owner_(parent->owner_),
1283  world_(parent->world_),
1284  finalize_task_(parent->finalize_task_) {
1285  TA_ASSERT(parent);
1286  parent->next_step_task_ = this;
1287  }
1288 
1289  virtual ~StepTask() {}
1290 
1291  void spawn_get_row_col_tasks(const size_type k) {
1292  // Submit the task to collect column tiles of left for iteration k
1293  if (trace_tasks)
1294  madness::DependencyInterface::inc_debug("StepTask::spawn_col");
1295  else
1296  madness::DependencyInterface::inc();
1297  world_.taskq.add(this, &StepTask::get_col, k,
1298  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
1299 
1300  // Submit the task to collect row tiles of right for iteration k
1301  if (trace_tasks)
1302  madness::DependencyInterface::inc_debug("StepTask::spawn_row");
1303  else
1304  madness::DependencyInterface::inc();
1305  world_.taskq.add(this, &StepTask::get_row, k,
1306  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
1307  }
1308 
1309  template <typename Derived>
1310  void make_next_step_tasks(Derived* task, size_type depth) {
1311  TA_ASSERT(depth > 0);
1312  // Set the depth to be no greater than the maximum number steps
1313  if (depth > owner_->k_) depth = owner_->k_;
1314 
1315  // Spawn n=depth step tasks
1316  for (; depth > 0ul; --depth) {
1317  // Set dep count of the tail task to 1, it will not start until this
1318  // task commands
1319  Derived* const next = new Derived(task, depth == 1 ? 1 : 0);
1320  task = next;
1321  }
1322 
1323  // Keep track of the tail ptr
1324  tail_step_task_ = task;
1325  }
1326 
1327  template <typename Derived, typename GroupType>
1328  void run(const size_type k, const GroupType& row_group,
1329  const GroupType& col_group) {
1330 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_STEP
1331  printf("step: start rank=%i k=%lu\n", owner_->world().rank(), k);
1332 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_STEP
1333 
1334  if (k < owner_->k_) {
1335  // Initialize next tail task and submit next task
1336  TA_ASSERT(next_step_task_);
1337  next_step_task_->tail_step_task_ = new Derived(
1338  static_cast<Derived*>(tail_step_task_),
1339  1); // <- ndep=1, will control its scheduling by this task
1340  // submit next step task ... even if it's same as tail_step_task_ it is
1341  // safe to submit because its ndep > 0 (see
1342  // StepTask::make_next_step_tasks)
1343  TA_ASSERT(tail_step_task_->ndep() > 0);
1344  world_.taskq.add(next_step_task_);
1345  next_step_task_ = nullptr;
1346 
1347  // Start broadcast of column and row tiles for this step
1348  world_.taskq.add(owner_, &Summa_::bcast_col, k, col_, row_group,
1349  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
1350  world_.taskq.add(owner_, &Summa_::bcast_row, k, row_, col_group,
1351  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
1352 
1353  // Submit tasks for the contraction of col and row tiles.
1354  owner_->contract(k, col_, row_, tail_step_task_);
1355 
1356  // Notify task dependencies
1357  TA_ASSERT(tail_step_task_);
1358  if (trace_tasks)
1359  tail_step_task_->notify_debug("StepTask nth ctor");
1360  else
1361  tail_step_task_->notify();
1362  finalize_task_->notify();
1363 
1364  } else if (finalize_task_) {
1365  // Signal the finalize task so it can run after all non-zero step
1366  // tasks have completed.
1367  finalize_task_->notify();
1368 
1369  // Cleanup any remaining step tasks
1370  StepTask* step_task = next_step_task_;
1371  while (step_task) {
1372  StepTask* const next_step_task = step_task->next_step_task_;
1373  step_task->next_step_task_ = nullptr;
1374  step_task->finalize_task_ = nullptr;
1375  world_.taskq.add(step_task);
1376  step_task = next_step_task;
1377  }
1378 
1379  if (trace_tasks)
1380  tail_step_task_->notify_debug("StepTask nth ctor");
1381  else
1382  tail_step_task_->notify();
1383  }
1384 
1385 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_STEP
1386  printf("step: finish rank=%i k=%lu\n", owner_->world().rank(), k);
1387 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_STEP
1388  }
1389 
1390  }; // class StepTask
1391 
1392  class DenseStepTask : public StepTask {
1393  protected:
1394  const size_type k_;
1395  using StepTask::owner_;
1396 
1397  public:
1398  DenseStepTask(const std::shared_ptr<Summa_>& owner, const size_type depth)
1399  : StepTask(owner, owner->k_ + 1ul), k_(0) {
1400  StepTask::make_next_step_tasks(this, depth);
1401  StepTask::spawn_get_row_col_tasks(k_);
1402  }
1403 
1404  DenseStepTask(DenseStepTask* const parent, const int ndep)
1405  : StepTask(parent, ndep), k_(parent->k_ + 1ul) {
1406  // Spawn tasks to get k-th row and column tiles
1407  if (k_ < owner_->k_) StepTask::spawn_get_row_col_tasks(k_);
1408  }
1409 
1410  virtual ~DenseStepTask() {}
1411 
1412  virtual void run(const madness::TaskThreadEnv&) {
1413  StepTask::template run<DenseStepTask>(k_, owner_->row_group_,
1414  owner_->col_group_);
1415  }
1416  }; // class DenseStepTask
1417 
1418  class SparseStepTask : public StepTask {
1419  protected:
1420  Future<size_type> k_{};
1421  Future<madness::Group> row_group_{};
1422  Future<madness::Group> col_group_{};
1423  using StepTask::finalize_task_;
1424  using StepTask::next_step_task_;
1425  using StepTask::owner_;
1426  using StepTask::world_;
1427 
1428  private:
1430  void iterate_task(size_type k, const size_type offset) {
1431  // Search for the next non-zero row and column
1432  k = owner_->iterate_sparse(k + offset);
1433  k_.set(k);
1434 
1435  if (k < owner_->k_) {
1436  // NOTE: The order of task submissions is dependent on the order in
1437  // which we want the tasks to complete.
1438 
1439  // Spawn tasks to get k-th row and column tiles
1440  StepTask::spawn_get_row_col_tasks(k);
1441 
1442  // Spawn tasks to construct the row and column broadcast group
1443  row_group_ = world_.taskq.add(owner_, &Summa_::make_row_group, k,
1444  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
1445  col_group_ = world_.taskq.add(owner_, &Summa_::make_col_group, k,
1446  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
1447 
1448  // Increment the finalize task dependency counter, which indicates
1449  // that this task is not the terminating step task.
1450  TA_ASSERT(finalize_task_);
1451  finalize_task_->inc();
1452  }
1453 
1454  if (trace_tasks)
1455  madness::DependencyInterface::notify_debug("SparseStepTask ctor");
1456  else
1457  madness::DependencyInterface::notify();
1458  }
1459 
1460  public:
1461  SparseStepTask(const std::shared_ptr<Summa_>& owner, size_type depth)
1462  : StepTask(owner, 1ul) {
1463  StepTask::make_next_step_tasks(this, depth);
1464 
1465  // Spawn a task to find the next non-zero iteration
1466  if (trace_tasks)
1467  madness::DependencyInterface::inc_debug("SparseStepTask ctor");
1468  else
1469  madness::DependencyInterface::inc();
1470  world_.taskq.add(this, &SparseStepTask::iterate_task, 0ul, 0ul,
1471  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
1472  }
1473 
1474  SparseStepTask(SparseStepTask* const parent, const int ndep)
1475  : StepTask(parent, ndep) {
1476  if (parent->k_.probe() && (parent->k_.get() >= owner_->k_)) {
1477  // Avoid running extra tasks if not needed.
1478  k_.set(parent->k_.get());
1479  TA_ASSERT(ndep ==
1480  1); // ensure that this does not get executed immediately
1481  } else {
1482  // Spawn a task to find the next non-zero iteration
1483  if (trace_tasks)
1484  madness::DependencyInterface::inc_debug("SparseStepTask ctor");
1485  else
1486  madness::DependencyInterface::inc();
1487  world_.taskq.add(this, &SparseStepTask::iterate_task, parent->k_, 1ul,
1488  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
1489  }
1490  }
1491 
1492  virtual ~SparseStepTask() {}
1493 
1494  virtual void run(const madness::TaskThreadEnv&) {
1495  StepTask::template run<SparseStepTask>(k_, row_group_, col_group_);
1496  }
1497  }; // class SparseStepTask
1498 
1499  public:
1501 
1516  Summa(const left_type& left, const right_type& right, World& world,
1517  const trange_type trange, const shape_type& shape,
1518  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap, const Permutation& perm,
1519  const op_type& op, const size_type k, const ProcGrid& proc_grid)
1520  : DistEvalImpl_(world, trange, shape, pmap, perm),
1521  left_(left),
1522  right_(right),
1523  op_(op),
1524  row_group_(),
1525  col_group_(),
1526  k_(k),
1527  proc_grid_(proc_grid),
1528  reduce_tasks_(NULL),
1529  left_start_local_(proc_grid_.rank_row() * k),
1530  left_end_(left.size()),
1531  left_stride_(k),
1532  left_stride_local_(proc_grid.proc_rows() * k),
1533  right_stride_(1ul),
1534  right_stride_local_(proc_grid.proc_cols()) {}
1535 
1536  virtual ~Summa() {}
1537 
1539 
1544  virtual Future<value_type> get_tile(size_type i) const {
1545  TA_ASSERT(TensorImpl_::is_local(i));
1546  TA_ASSERT(!TensorImpl_::is_zero(i));
1547 
1548  const size_type source_index = DistEvalImpl_::perm_index_to_source(i);
1549 
1550  // Compute tile coordinate in tile grid
1551  const size_type tile_row = source_index / proc_grid_.cols();
1552  const size_type tile_col = source_index % proc_grid_.cols();
1553  // Compute process coordinate of tile in the process grid
1554  const size_type proc_row = tile_row % proc_grid_.proc_rows();
1555  const size_type proc_col = tile_col % proc_grid_.proc_cols();
1556  // Compute the process that owns tile
1557  const ProcessID source = proc_row * proc_grid_.proc_cols() + proc_col;
1558 
1559  const madness::DistributedID key(DistEvalImpl_::id(), i);
1560  return TensorImpl_::world().gop.template recv<value_type>(source, key);
1561  }
1562 
1564 
1568  virtual void discard_tile(size_type i) const { get_tile(i); }
1569 
1570  private:
1572 
1579  size_type mem_bound_depth(size_type depth, const float left_sparsity,
1580  const float right_sparsity) {
1581  // Check if a memory bound has been set
1582  const size_type available_memory = max_memory_;
1583  if (available_memory) {
1584  // Compute the average memory requirement per iteration of this process
1585  const std::size_t local_memory_per_iter_left =
1586  (left_.trange().elements_range().volume() /
1587  left_.trange().tiles_range().volume()) *
1588  sizeof(typename numeric_type<typename left_type::eval_type>::type) *
1589  proc_grid_.local_rows() * (1.0f - left_sparsity);
1590  const std::size_t local_memory_per_iter_right =
1591  (right_.trange().elements_range().volume() /
1592  right_.trange().tiles_range().volume()) *
1593  sizeof(typename numeric_type<typename right_type::eval_type>::type) *
1594  proc_grid_.local_cols() * (1.0f - right_sparsity);
1595 
1596  // Compute the maximum number of iterations based on available memory
1597  const size_type mem_bound_depth =
1598  ((local_memory_per_iter_left + local_memory_per_iter_right) /
1599  available_memory);
1600 
1601  // Check if the memory bounded depth is less than the optimal depth
1602  if (depth > mem_bound_depth) {
1603  // Adjust the depth based on the available memory
1604  switch (mem_bound_depth) {
1605  case 0:
1606  // When memory bound depth is
1607  TA_EXCEPTION("Insufficient memory available for SUMMA");
1608  break;
1609  case 1:
1610  if (TensorImpl_::world().rank() == 0)
1611  printf(
1612  "!! WARNING TiledArray: Memory constraints limit the SUMMA "
1613  "depth depth to 1.\n"
1614  "!! WARNING TiledArray: Performance may be slow.\n");
1615  default:
1616  depth = mem_bound_depth;
1617  }
1618  }
1619  }
1620 
1621  return depth;
1622  }
1623 
1625 
1631  virtual int internal_eval() {
1632 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_EVAL
1633  printf("eval: start eval children rank=%i\n", TensorImpl_::world().rank());
1634 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_EVAL
1635 
1636  // Start evaluate child tensors
1637  left_.eval();
1638  right_.eval();
1639 
1640 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_EVAL
1641  printf("eval: finished eval children rank=%i\n",
1642  TensorImpl_::world().rank());
1643 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_EVAL
1644 
1645  size_type tile_count = 0ul;
1646  if (proc_grid_.local_size() > 0ul) {
1647  tile_count = initialize();
1648 
1649  // depth controls the number of simultaneous SUMMA iterations
1650  // that are scheduled.
1651 
1652  // The optimal depth is equal to the smallest dimension of the process
1653  // grid, but no less than 2
1654  size_type depth =
1655  std::max(ProcGrid::size_type(2),
1656  std::min(proc_grid_.proc_rows(), proc_grid_.proc_cols()));
1657 
1658  // Construct the first SUMMA iteration task
1659  if (TensorImpl_::shape().is_dense()) {
1660  // We cannot have more iterations than there are blocks in the k
1661  // dimension
1662  if (depth > k_) depth = k_;
1663 
1664  // Modify the number of concurrent iterations based on the available
1665  // memory.
1666  depth = mem_bound_depth(depth, 0.0f, 0.0f);
1667 
1668  // Enforce user defined depth bound
1669  if (max_depth_) depth = std::min(depth, max_depth_);
1670 
1671  TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(
1672  new DenseStepTask(shared_from_this(), depth));
1673  } else {
1674  // Increase the depth based on the amount of sparsity in an iteration.
1675 
1676  // Get the sparsity fractions for the left- and right-hand arguments.
1677  const float left_sparsity = left_.shape().sparsity();
1678  const float right_sparsity = right_.shape().sparsity();
1679 
1680  // Compute the fraction of non-zero result tiles in a single SUMMA
1681  // iteration.
1682  const float frac_non_zero = (1.0f - std::min(left_sparsity, 0.9f)) *
1683  (1.0f - std::min(right_sparsity, 0.9f));
1684 
1685  // Compute the new depth based on sparsity of the arguments
1686  depth =
1687  float(depth) * (1.0f - 1.35638f * std::log2(frac_non_zero)) + 0.5f;
1688 
1689  // We cannot have more iterations than there are blocks in the k
1690  // dimension
1691  if (depth > k_) depth = k_;
1692 
1693  // Modify the number of concurrent iterations based on the available
1694  // memory and sparsity of the argument tensors.
1695  depth = mem_bound_depth(depth, left_sparsity, right_sparsity);
1696 
1697  // Enforce user defined depth bound
1698  if (max_depth_) depth = std::min(depth, max_depth_);
1699 
1700  TensorImpl_::world().taskq.add(
1701  new SparseStepTask(shared_from_this(), depth));
1702  }
1703  }
1704 
1705 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_EVAL
1706  printf("eval: start wait children rank=%i\n", TensorImpl_::world().rank());
1707 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_EVAL
1708 
1709  // Wait for child tensors to be evaluated, and process tasks while waiting.
1710  left_.wait();
1711  right_.wait();
1712 
1713 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_EVAL
1714  printf("eval: finished wait children rank=%i\n",
1715  TensorImpl_::world().rank());
1716 #endif // TILEDARRAY_ENABLE_SUMMA_TRACE_EVAL
1717 
1718  return tile_count;
1719  }
1720 
1721 }; // class Summa
1722

1728  Summa<Left, Right, Op, Policy>::init_max_depth();
1729 
1730 template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Op, typename Policy>
1731 typename Summa<Left, Right, Op, Policy>::size_type
1732  Summa<Left, Right, Op, Policy>::max_memory_ =
1733  Summa<Left, Right, Op, Policy>::init_max_memory();
1734 } // namespace detail
